column4: hey people :D, so im having a little problem with my net, there seems to be a slight lag inbetween my select time and my actual browsing time, ive got a 8mb connection, and i jus wonder y its happening, could it b something having to do with my DNS, any help wud be greatly appreciated, thanks

i figured bcuz it never used to happen, it used to jus zip along, u kno hhow i can i doh kno reset them?
is the other end as fast as yours? maybe the other end has to catch up huh? or yeah you're resolving to an ipv6 as your first priority?
